title: bash_buddy
text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

title: bash_buddy
text:
Developer Guide
If you are new to using nbdev here are some useful pointers to get you started.

Install bash_buddy in Development mode
# make sure bash_buddy package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to bash_buddy
$ nbdev_prepare

title: bash_buddy
text:
Usage

Installation
Install latest from the GitHub repository:
$ pip install git+https://github.com/netzzwergeGithub/bash_buddy.git
or from conda
$ conda install -c netzzwergeGithub bash_buddy
or from pypi
$ pip install bash_buddy


Documentation
Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub repository’s pages. Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on conda and pypi respectively.
